frontmatter.title: Finding flows suspended by DLP
frontmatter.description: So you designed and implemented Data Loss Prevention policy in Power Automate. Now it's time to check if there was any impact on existing flows.

frontmatter.title: Custom connectors with DLP policy in Power Automate
frontmatter.description: Custom connectors are not yet supported for Power Platform DLP policies. Let's check how they are processed and how we could secure them.

frontmatter.title: Temporarily disabling Flow
frontmatter.description: There are some cases in which you'd like to supress a flow in Power Automate for certain period of time. Be careful - turning it off doesn't always work as expected!

frontmatter.title: How to import Excel file to existing SHP list
frontmatter.description: SharePoint doesn't provide the out-of-the-box option to import data from Excel file to existing list. There is, however, an interesting workaround which is based on PowerAutomate.
